meta.title: Best Dogs for Seattle Living: Rain & Hiking Guide
meta.description: Living in Seattle with a dog? Discover the best breeds for the PNW lifestyle, top hiking trails, and tips for rainy day walks.

local_tips: Invest in a good rain coat for your dog.
Check for blue-green algae in lakes before swimming.
Seattle is incredibly dog-friendly; many breweries allow dogs inside.
